name: Video Tape Terror - VHS large clamshell LIMITED TO 30
description:
The first home video format to bring death into your living room...is back to finish the job!

name: VIDEO TAPE TERROR Blu-Ray/DVD combo pack
description:
The first home video format to bring death into your living room...is back to finish the job!
Brian is a VHS collector that misses the good old days...when video rental stores existed, monsters in movies looked real, and films weren't filled with cartoon-looking CGI effects. After coming across a mysterious VCR and a few tapes, he decides to make his own movie.
LIMITED TO 25 COPIES (signed + numbered)
Blu-Ray/DVD combo pack! (BD-R and DVD-R) All Region Blu-Ray/DVD (NTSC).
Watch the trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TlqCHRmKmtE
Now Shipping!
